p: The receptor binding profiles of 18 HA subtypes are different, moreover, subtle changes in the architecture of the SA-binding pocket of HA may result in altered SA-linkage preference [ 33, 34]. For example, human H2 and H3 strains containing leucine at position 226 favor α-2,6-linked SA, whereas avian strains containing glutamine at this position display preferential binding to α-2,3 isomer [ 40, 41]. In addition, amino acids at positions 189, 193, 194, 216, 198 211 and 222 may also influence the architecture of the pocket region, and have been shown to be important for SA binding and specificity [ 37, 42, 43, 44].
